snippet.title: Shifter -  Peaceful place full of lightnings
snippet.description:
Shifter is a rogue-lite game with a gravity-shifting mechanic, made by a solo dev Niilo Hanni. It has 3 different areas with unique boss fights. Use different weapons such as swords, scythes, and shotguns to escape your dream, which has been hacked and turned into a twisted game by a hacker.

Shifter is different every time you play; the world is generated randomly so that in every run, the game feels like a different experience.

The area in this video is a new area I'm making on this game. It has lot's of lightnings, though I will reduce the amount of them on the game. I wanted to have lot's of them for this video!

Wishlist Shifter here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1683390/Shifter/?utm_source=channel&utm_campaign=lightningvid

Website: https://www.shiftergame.com/
Ilta Games website: https://iltagames.com/
